name: react-native-svg-mask-loader
description: React Native App Loader that shows an expanding image as a mask on your app. Direct rip of Twitter's loading animation. (Forked from https://github.com/TheSavior/react-native-mask-loader)
author: Rafael Contreras <raf@contrer.as>

scripts.prepublish: babel src/ -d lib && flow-copy-source src lib
